page.description: Returns the number of characters in a string.
page.syntax: Length as N = LEN(string as C)

return.name: Length
return.description: Returns the length of the string. A blank or uninitialized string returns a length of 0.

page.discussion: LEN() returns the length of the character string. The length of an empty or uninitialized character string is 0.
page.example:
dim firstname as c = " Steve "
? len(firstname) = 15
' trim trailing whitespace ? len(trim(firstname)) = 6
' trim leading whitespace ? len(ltrim(firstname)) = 14
' trim all whitespace ? len(alltrim(firstname)) = 5
